author: owlthechill
install_msg: Thank you for installing owl-cogs! Enhance your bot's personality with our unique and customizable cogs.
name: owl-cogs
description: Owl-cogs is a repository designed to host custom cogs for the Red-DiscordBot, aimed at adding personality and unique features to your bot. These cogs are tailored to provide engaging and interactive experiences, making your bot more fun and user-friendly.
